question: Nedumthokai, Kurumthokai, Nattinai, Ainkurunnu, Pathittupattu, Paripadla, Kuttu and Vari are the works of which of the following sangams?
explanation: Nedumthokai, Kurumthokai, Nattinai, Ainkurunnu, Pathittupattu, Paripadla, Kuttu and Vari are the works of third sangam. It lasted for 1850 years and was patronised by 49 kings.
